subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Roddick defeated Ramon Delgado, 6-3, 7-6 (4), on Tuesday to end a string of first-round upsets at the Legg Mason Tennis Classic in Washington. Alejandro Falla beat the fifth-seeded Mardy Fish, 5-7, 6-4, 6-2; Robert Kendrick defeated the third-seeded Feliciano López, 6-3, 7-5; and Marat Safin, the sixth seed, retired against Fabio Fognini with a pulled muscle in his neck.
